name: Consumers of the 7 Up drink
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-4-task-3.png)

You need to create a variable to store the number of users of the drink "7 Up".

Create a variable using the `let` keyword without assigning a value to the variable.

Choose the correct and most understandable name to create the variable from the following list:
`kolichestvo`, `number`, `7Up`, `7UpTotal`, `totalNumberOf7UpConsumers`, `7UpConsumersTotal`.
